text:
@realDonaldTrump 107,000+ deaths from COVID19 on your tiny hands
42M filed for unemployment benefits since mid-March
20% of workforce unemployment rate expected in May report out Friday

While you hide in OUR White House, surrounded by fencing and troops, afraid of peaceful protesters  
FAILURE
